name: Haunted (itch) (mattpor)
description:
Addictive, fun-to-solve audio/visual text adventure game .   Dark, moody, and atmospheric.  Lots of clues, puzzles, and riddles.  Tons of eye candy, haunting sounds and jump scares.  Old-school text adventure with a simple, intuitive parser.  If you're even mildly into text adventures, turn up the volume and check this one out. 

You've ran out of gas and stumble upon (you guessed it) a haunted house.  All you were looking for was some gas, but then ...

 I've tested this sucker in and out and believe I've got it fully debugged.  However, if you come across a bug in the game I'd sure appreciate it if you'd let me know.  This is more or less version 1 of the release so I anticipate some fixes here and there until I send up an updated version.  But at the moment I'll say it's rock solid and runs plenty stable.  

Limited to Widows 10 & 11.  Untested on Windows 7.  Working on porting to Mac.
